title: Person of Interest Highlights Part2
author: NZHiphopscaper
comment: I know Elias is a criminal enterprise boss, but the whole honor amongst thieves thing is the amiable trait that somehow makes him likable. Plus he is shows some niceties when he doesn't shoot John.
Reese would be the perfect Bruce Wayne/Batman

Elias became my most favourite character in the show right at the moment when he told John "Then we will meet again under less pleasant circumstances" and finished it with a little bow. The respect he showed here with his niceties and voice tone is enormous. He stayed my favourite till the end of the series. And I absolutely loved Elias and Harold duo and felt excited whenever they shared the screen.

"OMG, FINALLY!! 'Permissions been REVOKED!'﻿ My FAVORITE scene and it's finally up somewhere!"

He scared that fat bastard pretty good, didn't he? Reese is SUCH a badass!
I loved the interplay between Carter and Reese. Especially how it evolved from her hunting him to her being part of the team.
description:
***This Video may contain Spoilers if you havent seen some episodes***

Part 2 of 2 of some of my favourite POI scenes from episodes 1-9. I put a bit of music on some of the scenes, but its not overly done. The video may be too long for some people, but in my opinion there is so many good scenes its hard to narrow it down.

I hope somebody enjoys watching :) 

I purchased songs used in this video from Itunes
